hooks.command: COMMAND=$(echo $CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT | jq -r '.command // empty'); if echo "$COMMAND" | grep -qE 'git commit.*--no-verify|git push.*--force(?!-with-lease)'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Unsafe git command' >&2; exit 2; fi

FILE_PATH=$(echo $CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT | jq -r '.file_path // .path // empty'); if echo "$FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.(env|pem|key)$|secrets?/'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Cannot modify sensitive files' >&2; exit 2; fi

FILE_PATH=$(echo $CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT | jq -r '.file_path // .path // empty'); if echo "$FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx)$'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && pnpm tsc --noEmit 2>&1 | head -30 || true; fi

FILE_PATH=$(echo $CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT | jq -r '.file_path // .path // empty'); if echo "$FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)$'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && pnpm eslint --fix "$FILE_PATH" 2>&1 | head -20 || true; fi

FILE_PATH=$(echo $CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT | jq -r '.file_path // .path // empty'); if echo "$FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx|json|md)$'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && pnpm prettier --write "$FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

hooks.prompt: Verify subagent completed ALL tasks. Check: 1) All assigned work done? 2) All files created? 3) No TODO/FIXME placeholders? If incomplete: {"decision": "block", "reason": "Continue: [specific instruction]"}. If complete: {"decision": "allow"}

hooks.command: bash "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/.claude/hooks/scripts/quality-gates.sh" 2>&1 || echo 'Quality gates not configured for this project'
cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && (pnpm test 2>/dev/null || npm test 2>/dev/null || yarn test 2>/dev/null || dotnet test 2>/dev/null || echo 'No test runner found')
